description.p: Flowmotion Fighters transform their own movement into a weapon. With a perfect blend of speed and precision, they chain jumps, spins, and attacks in a seamless flow that overwhelms opponents before they can react.

You master chaining your motion into relentless offense. When you Dash, Jump, or Disengage as a bonus action, you can immediately move 10 feet in any direction as a free action. This movement can be vertical or along surfaces without falling until the end of your turn.
You can use this free movement once per turn at 3rd level, twice at 7th level, and three times at 15th level.

sheet.description: Dash, Jump, or Disengage as a bonus action to gain bonus 10 ft movement without provoking attacks. Chains increase at levels 7 and 15.

description.p: When you move 20 feet or more on your turn, you become harder to hit and strike harder. Until the start of your next turn, you gain +2 to AC and your next weapon attack deals additional damage equal to your distance moved/10.

sheet.description: Move 20+ ft to gain +2 AC and bonus damage equal to your distance moved/10.

description.p: You can attack while moving through the air. Whenever you jump, fall, or move vertically at least 10 feet, you can make one melee weapon attack as a bonus action. You can Dash while airborne without falling until the end of your movement.
You are immune to fall damage from distances less than 60 feet.

sheet.description: Bonus attack when jumping or falling. Dash midair. Immune to fall damage up to 60 ft.

description.p: Your momentum becomes a blur. When a creature hits you with an attack, you can use your reaction to immediately move up to half your speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If you end adjacent to the attacker, you can make one melee weapon attack as part of the same reaction.

sheet.description: Reaction: On getting hit, move half speed and attack if ending next to the attacker.

description.p: When you move through a creature's space, you can force it to make a Strength saving throw (DC 8 + proficiency bonus + Dexterity modifier) or fall prone. Once per turn when you move through a creature's space, you can teleport to an unoccupied space within 10 feet, treating the movement as if you blurred through them.

sheet.description: Dash through enemies to knock prone. Once/turn, teleport through an enemy.

description.p: You become the embodiment of motion. When you Dash, Jump, or Disengage, you can chain a number of free movement actions equal to your Dexterity modifier (minimum 2). Your speed increases by 20 feet. You ignore effects that would reduce your movement speed, and can move along vertical surfaces and liquids indefinitely without falling.

sheet.description: Chain Dex mod extra movements. +20 speed. Immune to slow effects. Infinite wall and water running.
